UserDailyMetric.name: UserDailyMetric
UserDailyMetric.description: Represents the daily engagement metrics for a user.

AllCallsCallBackLater.description: The number of calls in the day for this user with the call result Call Back Later.

AllCallsLeftVoicemail.description: The number of calls in the day for this user with the call result Left Voicemail.

AllCallsMeaningfulConnect.description: The number of calls in the day for this user with the call result Meaningful Connect.

AllCallsNotInterested.description: The number of calls in the day for this user with the call result Not Interested.

AllCallsUncategorized.description: The number of calls in the day for this user with no call result specified.

AllCallsUnqualified.description: The number of calls in the day for this user with the call result Unqualified.

AllEmailsBouncedCount.description: The total of hard and soft bounced emails for this user in the day.

AllEmailsDeliveredCount.description: The number of successfully delivered emails for this user in the day.

AllEmailsHardBouncedCount.description: The number of hard bounced emails for this user in the day.

AllEmailsNotDeliveredCount.description: The number of emails that were undelivered for all recipients on the email. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

AllEmailsOutOfOfficeCount.description: The number of emails that triggered an out-of-office reply for this user in the day.

AllEmailsSentCount.description: The number of emails sent by this user in the day.

AllEmailsSoftBouncedCount.description: The number of emails soft bounced for this user in the day.

AllEmailsTrackedSentCount.description: The number of emails sent by this user with engagement tracking enabled in the day.

AllEmailsUntrackedSentCount.description: The number of emails sent by this user without engagement tracking enabled in the day.

AllTotalCallsCount.description: The total number of calls by this user with all call results in the day.

DailyCutOffTimeStamp.description: The time of day when each 24-hour metrics period starts and ends.

Date.description: The date on which the engagement occurred.

DateInt.description: The date on which the engagement occurred, in yyyymmdd format.

HardBounceTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent with hard bounce tracking. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

LinkClickTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent with link click tracking. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

OpenTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent with open tracking. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

OutOfOfficeTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent with out-of-office tracking. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

RecipientReplies.description: The number of unique recipients who responded to an email. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

RecipientSends.description: The number of unique recipients who were sent an email. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

ReplyTrackableRecipientSends.description: The number of recipients who were sent an email with reply tracking. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

ReplyTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent with reply tracking. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

SoftBounceTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent with soft bounce tracking. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

SomeEmailsDeliveredCount.description: The number of emails that were successfully delivered to at least one recipient on the email. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

SomeEmailsDeliveredRate.description: The percentage of emails that were successfully delivered to at least one recipient on the email. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TrackableRecipientSendReplyRt.description: The percentage of emails sent with reply tracking that received replies from unique recipients. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

TrackableSendHardBounceRate.description: The percentage of emails sent with hard bounce tracking that hard bounced. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TrackableSendLinkClickRate.description: The percentage of emails sent with link tracking that had link clicks. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

TrackableSendOpenRate.description: The percentage of emails sent with open tracking that were opened by a recipient. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

TrackableSendOutOfOfficeRate.description: The percentage of emails sent with out-of-office tracking that received out-of-office replies. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TrackableSendReplyRate.description: The percentage of emails sent with reply tracking that received replies. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

TrackableSendSoftBounceRate.description: The percentage of emails sent with soft bounce tracking that soft bounced. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

UniqueEmailsLinkClickedCount.description: The number of unique recipients who clicked a link in an email sent by the user on the day.

UniqueEmailsOpenedCount.description: The number of unique recipients who opened an email sent by the user on the day.

UniqueEmailsRepliedCount.description: The number of unique recipients who replied to an email sent by the user on the day.

UserId.description: The ID of the related user.
